name: Charcoal Glass
description: Smart Counter Depth 4-Door Flex™ refrigerator with Family Hub™ helps you connect to your family and home.

cards.name: Press or pour water two ways
cards.description: Quick access to refreshingly cool, filtered water two ways. Choose from an internal dispenser or a built-in pitcher that automatically refills, with the option to infuse with a flavor.

cards.name: Convert from fridge to freezer
cards.description: Enjoy your favorite beverage with your choice of ice. Select from cubed ice or Ice Bites that chill your drink faster.

cards.name: Powerful cooling performance
cards.description: A premium cooling system featuring three evaporators for ultimate freshness and providing precise temperature and humidity controls in all three zones to help your food stay fresher longer.

cards.name: Fresh air, day after day
cards.description: Keep the air in your fridge fresh day after day with a built-in deodorizing filter. The filter reduces odor from the air in your fridge, while UV technology continuously cleans the filter itself.

name: Bespoke Smart Slide-in Gas Range
description: The Smart Front Control Slide-in Gas Range features a Smart Dial, Air Fry and Wi-Fi ,Tuscan Steel or White Glass.

name: Bespoke 5.3 cu. ft.
description: Make laundry day easy on your back. Add a pedestal to raise your Washer and Dryer to more comfortable height for loading and unloading.

name: Bespoke Jet™
description: Bespoke Jet™ Cordless Stick Vacuum with All in One Clean Station in Woody Green

name: PowerGrill Duo™
description: 1.2 cu. ft. PowerGrill Duo™ Countertop Microwave with Power Convection and Built-In Application in Black
